headerText: The `v-btn-toggle` component is a simple wrapper for `v-item-group` built specifically to work with `v-btn`.

usage.desc: Toggle buttons allow you to create a styled group of buttons that can selected or toggled under a single `v-model`

app-bar.desc: Easily integrate customized button solutions with a `v-toolbar`

qwerty.desc: Group similar actions and design your own WYSIWYG component.

rounded.desc: You can make `VBtnToggle` rounded using the `rounded` prop.

multiple.desc: `multiple` `VBtnToggle` allows user to select multiple variants and returns value as an array.
